text:
Hey everyone!
My name is Athanasios Theocharis, a sophomore in Computer Science in AUTH, Greece. I've started to get interested in Julia after I attended the Scientific Machine Learning talks in JuliaCon. The project that got my attention the most is Multi-Start Optimization Methods. I hope I get the chance to contribute!
